body_html:
Not that difficult, but this came up before and the result was to limit our pip packages to 2 cuda compute capabilities. 3.0, we wont drop.
if we do 6.1, we will drop 5.2
We will see a worse degradation for more people IMO once we do that.

body:
Not that difficult, but this came up before and the result was to limit our pip packages to 2 cuda compute capabilities. 3.0, we wont drop.
if we do 6.1, we will drop 5.2
We will see a worse degradation for more people IMO once we do that.
